GeoLocalizationResult.Comment: Represent The Geo Localization Result Of A RFDevice.

Property.Name: PrimaryKey
Property.Comment: The Unique PrimarKey For This Result.

Property.Name: Id
Property.Comment: The Id Of The Localized RFDevice.

Property.Name: Latitude
Property.Comment: The Latitude Of The Localized RF Device (WGS84).

Property.Name: Longitude
Property.Comment: The Longitude Of The Localized RF Device (WGS84).

Property.Name: Altitude
Property.Comment: The Elevation Of The Localized RF Device Above The Sea Level (Meter).
